key.name: mark-toggle
key.description: Toggle mark at cursor (and enable "sticky mode"). Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: mark-up
key.description: Mark the next line (upwards) that has the same line offset as the cursor (column if selection). Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: mark-down
key.description: Mark the next line (downwards) that has the same line offset as the cursor (column if selection). Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: mark-alt-up
key.description: Mark the next line (upwards) that has the same 'word' offset as the cursor. If selection: mark the next match to the current selection. Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: mark-alt-down
key.description: Mark the next line (downwards) that has the same 'word' offset as the cursor. If selection: mark the next match to the current selection. Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: incr-num
key.description: Insert integers incrementing from zero at each mark. Start at first mark placed, end at last. Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: incr-num1
key.description: Insert integers incrementing from one at each mark. Start at first mark placed, end at last. Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: incr-lower
key.description: Insert chars incrementing from a-z at each mark. Start at first mark placed, end at last. Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: incr-upper
key.description: Insert chars incrementing from A-Z at each mark. Start at first mark placed, end at last. Format as accepted by gtk_accelerator_parse.

key.name: word-seperators
key.description: List of characters classified as seperators (or non-word), affecting vertical marking based on word offset. Default is python's string.punctuation (excluding '_' and '-'). Space and tab are always included.

key.name: mark-selection-bg
key.description: The background color of mark selections. Should be distinct from other backgrounds (e.g. search matches).

key.name: mark-selection-fg
key.description: The foreground color of mark selections.
